game.beginning: In a world where magic has been outlawed, the land of Eridoria is plagued by dark creatures that lurk in every shadow.
game.ending: With the help of a motley group of allies, Lyra must master her magical abilities and defeat the tyrannical sorcerer-kings who rule with an iron fist to restore freedom and magic to the world.
game.synopsis: In the realm of Eridoria, where magic is forbidden and those born with the gift are persecuted, a young orphan named Lyra discovers she has the power to wield the ancient arts. As she embarks on a perilous journey to uncover the truth about her past and her abilities, Lyra becomes entangled in a rebellion against the ruling sorcerer-kings who seek to exploit her powers for their own gain.
game.title: Shadows of Eridoria
